author: dildick
body: During the 2018 data taking period the CSC L1 local trigger algorithms for the ME1/1 motherboard, ALCT mezzanine board and DCFEB will be tested and brought (partially) online. This modifier will enable us to switch on the essential upgrades in `L1Trigger/CSCTriggerPrimitives` to cope with higher instantaneous luminosity.
title: Modifier for high-lumi CSC L1 local trigger algorithms
